clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY FORTIFICATION AS ONE ACTION. While attached, any bonus to A provided by the Fortification is doubled. Multiple attachments are cumulative.
name: ADVANCED SECURITY SYSTEM
text: ATTACH TO ANY FORTIFICATION AS ONE ACTION. While attached, any bonus to A provided by the Fortification is doubled.

clarification_text: PLAY AS THREE ACTIONS. All your warriors in play that are infected by a VIRUS are no longer infected. This card does not prevent future infections.
name: ANTI-TOXIN
text: PLAY AS THREE ACTIONS. All your warriors in play that are infected by a VIRUS are no longer infected. This card does not prevent future infections.

clarification_text: Give to any ISLAND TEAM MEMBER or SKULL SEEKER as two actions. One of four KEY-CODE SKULLS. If the warrior has possession of all four KEY-CODE SKULLS, it may automatically kill all the warriors in any one Area (except your own) as three actions (ignore affiliations). This uses your Tactical Action and points are earned.
name: ASIAN KEY-CODE SKULL
text: Give to any ISLAND TEAM MEMBER or SKULL SEEKER as two actions. One of four KEY-CODE SKULLS. If the warrior has possession of all four KEY-CODE SKULLS, it may automatically kill all the warriors in any one Area (except your own) as three actions (ignore affiliations). This is considered an attack and points are earned.

clarification_text: PLAY ON YOUR WARRIOR DURING COMBAT. For every point you lower the warrior's base A, its base F increases by 2. The warrior's A may not be lower than 0.
name: BATTLE MADNESS
text: PLAY ON YOUR WARRIOR DURING COMBAT. For every point you lower the warrior's base A, its base F increases by 2. The warrior's A may not be lower than 0.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO A PROPHET IN YOUR OUTPOST AS ONE ACTION. PROPHECY. While in play, all your opponents must keep their hands face-up on the table, for all to see. You must pay 6D at the beginning of each of your turns to keep this card in play. If you do not pay, this card is annihilated.

clarification_text: COMMANDER. BROTHERBOUND TROOPER. SERGEANT. Other BROTHERBOUND TROOPERS in the same Combat Area gain +2 to F, S and A. The Sergeant may not increase its own ratings, but others may. Multiple Sergeants provide cumulative bonuses.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO THE GAME AS TWO ACTIONS. VIRUS. While in play, all Doomtroopers in all Outposts suffer -1 to their F, S and A. Multiple copies of this card in play are cumulative.

text: ATTACH TO THE GAME AS TWO ACTIONS. VIRUS. While in play, all Doomtroopers in all Outposts suffer -1 to their F, S and A. Multiple copies of this card in play are cumulative.

text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION. You may automatically IMPRISON any one warrior from any Outpost in play. Place the warrior under this card. The warrior is still "in play" but has no effect on the game. If this card is discarded, the warrior are returned to their Outpost.

text: ATTACH TO YOURSELF AS ONE ACTION. While in play, whenever you perform an Attack action, you may send up to three warriors with modified Values of 4 or less to attack as a group. All must be legal attackers. They combine their modified F and S. The opponent may retaliate against only one of the Attackers (opponent's choice).

clarification_text: ATTACH TO A PROPHET IN YOUR OUTPOST AS ONE ACTION. PROPHECY. Choose any non-Crescentia affiliation. While in play, your Crescentia warriors gain + to their F, S and A whenever combating warriors of that affiliation.
name: OUR TRUE ENEMY IS REVEALED
text: ATTACH TO A PROPHET IN YOUR OUTPOST AS ONE ACTION. PROPHECY. Choose any non-Crescentia affiliation. While in play, your Crescentia warriors gain +3 to their F, S and A whenever combating warriors of that affiliation.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO A PROPHET IN YOUR OUTPOST AS ONE ACTION. PROPHECY. While in play, you may increase any one of your Crescentia warrior's base F or S by +1 for every D you spend during combat. D may continue to be spent throughout the combat. The warrior's F and S return to normal after the combat is over.
name: OUR WILL IS BEYOND MEASURE
text: ATTACH TO A PROPHET IN YOUR OUTPOST AS ONE ACTION. PROPHECY. While in play, you may increase any one of your Crescentia warrior's F or S by +1 for every D you spend during combat. D may continue to be spend throughout the combat. The warrior's F and S return to normal after the combat is over.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A The Lutheran Triad WARRIOR. VEHICLE. AIRSHIP. Provides + 2 to S and A. If given to a Tribal PATRIARCH, your RITUALS require one less action to play with a minimum of 0 actions used (0-action RITUALS may be played at any time).
name: PALANQUIN AIRVESSEL
text: GIVE TO A LUTHERAN TRIAD WARRIOR. AIRSHIP AND VEHICLE. Provides +2 to S and A. If given to a Tribal PATRIARCH, your RITUALS require one less action to play (with a minimum of 0 actions used).

clarification_text: PLAY ON ANY DOOMTROOPER IN AN OUTPOST DURING YOUR TURN. VIRUS. The warrior forces you to draw one less card during your Draw step. All Doomtroopers in the same area as the warrior for a full turn (from your Draw step to your next) will also become infected with Parasitic Stupor (effects are cumulative). A player may always draw at least one card.
name: PARASITIC STUPOR
text: PLAY ON ANY DOOMTROOPER IN AN OUTPOST DURING YOUR TURN. VIRUS. The warrior forces you to draw one less card during your draw step. All Doomtroopers in the same area as the warrior for a full turn (from your Draw step to your next) will also become infected with Parasitic Stupor (effects are cumulative). A player may always draw at least one card.

clarification_text: The Patriarch may not be attacked unless it is the only warrior in the Combat Area (or all remaining warriors are Patriarchs or NONCOMBATANTS).
name: PATRIARCH
text: The Patriarch may not be attacked unless it is the only warrior in the Outpost (or all remaining warriors are Patriarchs).

name: PHISCHE
text: FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH. MUST BE ADDED TO AND MAY NOT LEAVE THE OUTPOST. CONSIDERED A BEAST. Considered a Tribal warrior as well as a Dark Legion warrior. May not be given Equipment. Warriors wounded by the Phische in a Fight combat are automatically killed and annihilated.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO YOUR OUTPOST AS ONE ACTION. Each time one of your TRIBAL warriors kills a Doomtrooper you may place one of the slain Warrior's Equipment cards under this card (they are not considered attachments). These Equipment cards may be given to your TRIBAL warriors as one action each (ignore affiliation restrictions).
name: PILLAGED MUNITIONS
text: ATTACH TO YOUR OUTPOST AS ONE ACTION. Each time one of your Tribal warriors kills a Doomtrooper you may place one of the slain Warrior's Equipment cards under this card. These Equipment cards may be given to your Tribal warriors as one action each (ignore affiliation restrictions).

clarification_text: PLAY AS THREE ACTIONS. All Fortification cards in play are annihilated. Other cards considered FORTIFICATIONS are not affected.
name: PLANETARY BOMBING
text: PLAY AS THREE ACTIONS. All Fortification cards in play are annihilated.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO ANY FIGHT WEAPON (BUT NOT A FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON). When using the weapon, opponents do not gain the effects of ARMOR.
name: POWER INDUCTION
text: ATTACH TO ANY FIGHT WEAPON (BUT NOT A FIGHT/SHOOT WEAPON). When using the weapon, opponents do not gain the effects of ARMOR.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A The Templars WARRIOR. Opponents must spend 2 actions to attack any warrior in the same Combat Area as a warrior with a Predatorian.
name: PREDATORIAN
text: GIVE TO A TEMPLAR WARRIOR. Opponents must spend 2 actions to attack any warrior in the same Outpost as the Predatorian.

clarification_text: BUILD IN YOUR COMBAT AREA. Each time you IMPRISON a warrior, you may place it in the Work Camp (no matter where it is). For each prisoner in the Camp, you gain an extra Standard Action per turn. If this card is discarded, all prisoners are discarded as well.
name: PRISONER WORK CAMP
text: ADD TO YOUR SQUAD, KOHORT OR OUTPOST. Each time you IMPRISON a warrior, you may place it in the Work Camp (no matter where it is). For each prisoner in the Camp, you gain an extra non-acttack action per turn. If this card is discarded, all prisoners are discarded as well.

clarification_text: PLAY AS THREE ACTIONS. You may take ANY Relic from under the MUSEUM and give it to a legal recipient among your forces. Once discarded or annihilated, the taken Relic returns to its owner.
name: PRIVATE COLLECTOR
text: PLAY AS THREE ACTIONS. You may take ANY Relic from under the MUSEUM and give it to a legal recipient among your forces. Once discarded or annihilated, it returns to its owner.

clarification_text: The Prophet may not be attacked unless it is the only warrior in the Combat Area (or all remaining warriors are Prophets or NONCOMBATANTS).
name: PROPHET
text: The Prophet may not be attacked unless it is the only warrior in the Outpost (or all remaining warriors are Prophets).

clarification_text: ATTACH TO YOUR CRESCENTIA WARRIOR AT ANY TIME. While attached, the warrior is considered a PROPHET.
name: PROPHETIC VISION
text: PLAY ON YOUR CRESCENTIA WARRIOR AT ANY TIME. While attached, the warrior is considered a PROPHET.

clarification_text: PLAY DURING COMBAT ON ANY BEAST. Any modifier to F, S and/or A provided by the Beast is doubled until the end of combat.
name: RAMPAGE!
text: PLAY DURING COMBAT ON ANY BEAST. Any bonus to F, S and/or A provided by the Beast is doubled until the end of combat.

clarification_text: ASSIGN TO ANY PLAYER. The player must (via card play) discard or annihilate any one Warzone in play to fulfill the Mission and earn 5 Promotion Points.
name: RAZE THE LAND
text: ASSIGN TO ANY PLAYER. The player must (via card play) discard or annihilate any one Warzone in play to fulfill the Mission and earn 5 Promotion Points.

clarification_text: BUILD IN YOUR COMBAT AREA. Place a warrior from the same Area behind the Fence when you Build it (it will hold one warrior). If the warrior is attacked in a Fight combat, its opponent first encounters the fence. This is the equivalent of an F:6 attack against the opponent. Cards that affect F and Fight combats may be used on both combatants. Fence may not be wounded or killed. If opponent survives, original attack begins. A different warrior may go behind the Fence as one action.
name: RAZOR WIRE FENCE
text: GIVE TO ANY WARRIOR AS ONE ACTION. If this warrior is attacked in a Fight combat, its opponent first encounters the fence. This is the equivalent of an F: 6 attack against the opponent. Cards that affect F and Fight combats may be used on both "combatants". Fence may not be wounded or killed. If opponent survives, original attack begins. A different warrior may go behind the Fence as one action.

clarification_text: PLAY ON ALL THE DOOMTROOPERS IN AN OUTPOST DURING YOUR TURN. VIRUS. The warriors are INFECTED and will be automatically killed if wounded in combat. Doomtroopers in the same Combat Area as any of the diseased warriors immediately become INFECTED with Red Plague.
name: RED PLAGUE
text: PLAY ON ALL THE DOOMTROOPERS IN AN OUTPOST DURING YOUR TURN. VIRUS. The warriors will be automatically killed if wounded in combat. Doomtroopers in the same area as any of the diseased warriors immediately become Infected with Red Plague.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME EXCEPT DURING COMBAT. You may immediately Transfer all of your warriors (or as many as you wish). This does not cost any actions. Normal Transfer rules apply. You may Transfer Tribal warriors only if you are currently affected by the EMISSARIES card.
name: REDEPLOYMENT
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME EXCEPT DURING COMBAT. You may immediately Transfer all of your warriors (or as many as you wish). This does not cost any actions. Normal Transfer rules apply. You may Transfer Tribal warriors only if you are currently affected by the EMISSARIES card.

name: REDIRECT
text: Play immediately after any Art spell is cast. The spell does not affect its intended target. Instead, you may redirect that spell towards any legal target, even yourself. The spell MUST be redirected to a legal target or this card may not be played.

clarification_text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION. You may take a VEHICLE from any of your warriors in your Squad or Kohort and give it to one of your warriors in your Outpost (or vice-versa). The VEHICLE may not be given to (or come from) a TRIBAL warrior. A Doomtrooper may not have a Dark Legion warrior's VEHICLE and vice-versa.
name: REQUISITION
text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION. You may take a VEHICLE from any of your warriors in your Squad/Kohort and give it to one of your warriors in your Outpost (or vice-versa). The VEHICLE may not be given to (or come from) a Tribal warrior. A Doomtrooper may not have a Dark Legion warrior's VEHICLE and vice-versa.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A RASPUTIN WARRIOR.
name: RIVETBULL
text: GIVE TO A RASPUTIN WARRIOR.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. You may take any Beast card in play and give it to any warrior in your Outpost (ignore affiliations). This card has no effect on warriors that are considered BEASTS.
name: RUSTLERS!
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME. You may take any Beast card in play and give it to any warrior in your Outpost (ignore affiliations). This card has no effect on warriors that are considered Beasts.

clarification_text: When in a Fight combat the Sacred Tear's base F becomes 16, it is a SLAYER, and it is annihilated after the combat (points are earned by the opponent only if it would have wounded the Sacred Tear anyway).
name: SACRED TEAR
text: The Sacred Tear behaves normally in combats except when it attacks with a Fight combat. When it does, its base F becomes 16, it automatically kills any warrior it wounds, and it is annihilated after the combat (points are earned by the opponent only if it would have wounded the Sacred Tear anyway).

clarification_text: SOLDAT. SERGEANT.
name: SCHWERWAFFE SOLDAT
text: CONSIDERED A SOLDAT.

clarification_text: CAVALIER. BEAST. Gains +1 to their F, S and A for each other CAVALIER in the same Combat Area. While in play, no other warriors in the same Combat Area may be attacked, only the Scout.
name: SCOUT CAVALIER
text: CONSIDERED A CAVALIER AND A BEAST. Cavaliers gain +1 to their F, S and A for each other Cavalier in the same Outpost. While the Scout is in your Outpost, no warrior in the Outpost may be attacked except the Scout.

clarification_text: SOLDAT. SLAYER (and the killed warrior is annihilated instead of discarded). May not be given WEAPONS.
name: SHOCK SOLDAT
text: CONSIDERED A SOLDAT. Warriors wounded by the Shock Soldats are automatically killed and annihilated. May not be given WEAPONS.

clarification_text: ASSIGN TO ANY WARRIOR THAT IS NOT A NONCOMBATANT. The warrior is now considered a SKULL SEEKER. It may only gain KEY-CODE SKULLS while in the Outpost. This Mission is never fulfilled.
name: SKULL-SEEKER
text: ASSIGN TO ANY WARRIOR THAT IS ALLOWED TO BE IN COMBAT. The warrior is now considered a SKULL SEEKER. It may only gain KEY-CODE SKULLS while in the Outpost. This Mission is never fulfilled.

name: SOLDAT
text: The Soldat gains +2 to its F, S and A for each SCHWERWAFFE SOLDAT in the same area.

clarification_text: SOLDAT. COMMANDER. Other SOLDATS in the same Combat Area as the Kommendant gain + to F, S and A. The Kommendant will not affect its own ratings, but others may.
name: SOLDAT KOMMENDANT
text: COMMANDER. CONSIDERED A SOLDAT. All SOLDATS in the same area as the Soldat Kommendant gain +3 to F, S and A. The Kommendant will not affect its own ratings, but others may.

clarification_text: Give to any ISLAND TEAM MEMBER or SKULL SEEKER as two actions. One of four KEY-CODE SKULLS. If the warrior has possession of all four KEY-CODE SKULLS, it may automatically kill all the warriors in any one Area (except your own) as three actions (ignore affiliations). This uses your Tactical Action and points are earned.
name: SOUTH AMERICAN KEY-CODE SKULL
text: Give to any ISLAND TEAM MEMBER or SKULL SEEKER as two actions. One of four KEY-CODE SKULLS. If the warrior has possession of all four KEY-CODE SKULLS, it may automatically kill all the warriors in any one Area (except your own) as three actions (ignore affiliations). This is considered an attack and points are earned.

clarification_text: DARK EDEN WARZONE. ADD TO YOUR OUTPOST. Only The Templars-affiliated warriors may defend from this Warzone (unless permitted by another card). A warrior defending from this Warzone gains an additional + to F, S and A if its opponent is another Tribal warrior.
name: SOUTHERN EUROPE
text: DARK EDEN WARZONE. ADD TO YOUR OUTPOST. Only Templars-affiliated warriors may defend from this Warzone (unless permitted by another card). A warrior defending from this Warzone gains an additional +3 to F, S and A if its opponent is another Tribal warrior.

clarification_text: PLAY AT ANY TIME, BUT ONLY DURING A TEAM GAME. You and your teammates may leave the table and trade the cards in your hands amongst yourselves. A player may return with any number of cards in his or her hand. The players gain complete control of these cards until the end of the game. The summit should last no longer than 3 minutes. Each team may only play this card once per game.
name: SUMMIT MEETING
text: PLAY AT ANY TIME, BUT ONLY DURING A TEAM GAME. You and your teammates may leave the table and trade the cards in your hands amongst yourselves. A player may return with any number of cards in his or her hand. The players gain complete control of these cards until the end of the game. The summit should last no longer than 3 minutes. Each team may only play this card once per game.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A CRESCENTIA WARRIOR. A warrior with an Ox may perform a Sabotage action as two actions, even if the opponent has warriors in play. This uses the Tactical Action. If successful the warrior only gains 3 promotion points.
name: SUPPORT ARTILLERY OX
text: GIVE TO A CRESCENTIA WARRIOR. A warrior with an Ox may attack a PLAYER as two actions, even if the opponent has warriors in play. This is considered an attack action. If successful the warrior only gains 3 Promotion Points.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A RASPUTIN WARRIOR. VEHICLE. AIRSHIP. Warrior gains +6 to S and A.
name: TAILWAVE
text: GIVE TO A RASPUTIN WARRIOR. AIRSHIP AND VEHICLE. Warrior gains +6 to S and A.

clarification_text: For each additional The Templars LEGIONNAIRE in the same Combat Area, this one gains +2 to F, S and A.
name: TEMPLAR LEGIONNAIRE
text: For each additional Templar Legionnaire in the same area, this one gains +2 to F, S and A.

clarification_text: FIRST STRIKE.
name: TEMPLAR MARINE
text: Templar Marines strike first in combat. If the opponent survives, it may retailiate.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO YOUR The Lutheran Triad WARRIOR AT ANY TIME. While attached, the warrior is considered a PATRIARCH.
name: THE CALLING
text: PLAY ON YOUR LUTHERAN TRIAD WARRIOR AT ANY TIME. While attached, the warrior is considered a PATRIARCH.

name: THE CONVICTION
text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION IF YOU HAVE A TRIBAL PATRIARCH IN YOUR OUTPOST. RITUAL. Until the beginning of your next turn, the base F, S and A of one of your Lutheran Triad warriors is tripled. The affected warrior is annihilated at the beginning of your next turn as well (no points are earned).

clarification_text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION IF YOU HAVE A TRIBAL PATRIARCH IN YOUR OUTPOST. RITUAL. Until the beginning of your next turn, the F and S of all your The Lutheran Triad warriors are doubled when defending. When attacking, they are normal.
name: THE DEFIANCE
text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION IF YOU HAVE A TRIBAL PATRIARCH IN YOUR OUTPOST. RITUAL. Until the beginning of your next turn, the F and S of all of your Lutheran Triad warriors are doubled when defending. When attacking, they are normal.

name: THE HOWLING IS UPON US
text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION IF YOUR HAVE A PROPHET IN YOUR OUTPOST. PROPHECY. While in play, bonuses to F, S and/or A provided by all your Crescentia-affiliated Beasts are doubled. This card is annihilated at the beginning of your next turn.

name: THE PROTECTION
text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION IF YOU HAVE A TRIBAL PATRIARCH IN YOUR OUTPOST. RITUAL. Until the beginning of your next turn, all your Lutheran Triad warriors may not be wounded or killed when attacking. When defending, they may be killed as normal.

name: THE SACRIFICE
text: PLAY AS ONE ACTION IF YOU HAVE A TRIBAL PATRIARCH IN YOUR OUTPOST. RITUAL. Until the beginning of your next turn, all your Lutheran Triad warriors gain +X to their F, S and A. You must sacrifice any one of your Lutheran Triad warriors in play (discard it), and X is the base V of the sacrificed warrior.

clarification_text: ATTACH TO YOURSELF AS ONE ACTION. While in play, you may prevent Equipment cards in play from being discarded, annihilated, or taken, provided you pay 3D per card, UNLESS the requirements to use that card require it being discarded or annihilated. You may protect Equipment cards on a case by case basis.
name: TIGHT GRIP
text: ATTACH TO YOURSELF AS ONE ACTION. While in play, you may prevent Equipment cards in play from being discarded, annihilated, or taken, provided you pay 3D per card, UNLESS the requirements to use that card require it being discarded or annihilated. You may protect Equipment cards on a case by case basis.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A CRESCENTIA WARRIOR. VEHICLE. Provides + to S and A.
name: TORRENT BATTLE WAGON
text: GIVE TO A CRESCENTIA WARRIOR. VEHICLE. Provides +3 to S and A.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A The Templars WARRIOR. If the warrior with the Tusked Serett is in a Fight combat, it may immediately Fight its opponent again after the first combat is over (provided both warriors survive the first combat).
name: TUSKED SERETT
text: GIVE TO A TEMPLAR WARRIOR. If the warrior with the Tusked Serett is in a Fight combat, it may immediately Fight its opponent again after the first combat is over (provided both warriors survive the first combat).

clarification_text: ATTACH TO YOURSELF AT ANY TIME. While in play, your warriors with TANKS and other non-AIRSHIP, non-SUBMARINE VEHICLES may gain the effects of Fortifications and be in Cover. This includes warriors that are considered those type of VEHICLES. If discarded, all such cards immediately leave Cover.
name: URBAN TACTICS
text: ATTACH TO YOURSELF AT ANY TIME. While in play, your warriors with TANKS and other non-AIRSHIP, non-SUBMARINE VEHICLES may gain the effects of Fortifications and be in Cover (but not Added in Cover). This includes warriors that are considered TANKS and other non-AIRSHIP VEHICLES. If discarded, all such cards immediately leave Cover.

clarification_text: PLAY ON ANY DOOMTROOPER IN AN OUTPOST DURING YOUR TURN. VIRUS. The warrior loses -2 to its F, S and A. At the beginning of each of YOUR Draw steps, it loses another -2 to F, S and A. Ratings may fall below 0. All Doomtroopers in the same area as the warrior for a full turn (from your Draw step to your next) will also become infected with V-3
name: V-3
text: PLAY ON ANY DOOMTROOPER IN AN OUTPOST DURING YOUR TURN. VIRUS. The warrior loses -2 to its F, S and A. At the beginning of each of YOUR Draw steps, it loses another -2 to F, S and A. Ratings may fall below 0. All Doomtroopers in the same area as the warrior for a full turn (from your Draw step to your next) will also become infected with V-3

clarification_text: GIVE TO A RASPUTIN WARRIOR. VEHICLE. AIRSHIP. Warrior gains +6 to A, and gains FIRST STRIKE in Shoot combats.
name: VEILED DART
text: GIVE TO A RASPUTIN WARRIOR. AIRSHIP AND VEHICLE. Warrior gains +6 to A, and strikes first in Shoot combats. If opponent survives it may retailiate.

clarification_text: GIVE TO A The Templars WARRIOR. VEHICLE. AIRSHIP. Provides + to S and A.
name: VEROUNIST STINGRAY
text: GIVE TO A TEMPLAR WARRIOR. AIRSHIP AND VEHICLE. Provides +3 to S and A.

name: WITHERING DEATH
text: PLAY ON ANY DOOMTROOPER IN AN OUTPOST DURING YOUR TURN. VIRUS. The warrior must spend 3 actions to attack. All Doomtroopers in the same area as the warrior for a full turn (from your Draw step to your next) will also become infected with Withering Death.

name: ZHURGON
text: FOLLOWER OF ALGEROTH. MUST BE ADDED TO AND MAY NOT LEAVE THE OUTPOST. CONSIDERED A BEAST. Considered a Tribal warrior as well as a Dark Legion warrior. May not be given Equipment. Warriors wounded by the Zhurgon in a Shoot combat are automatically killed and annihilated.
